tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_apr
tables.description: This table provides a brief overview of the Average Annual Percentage Returns (APR) for various assets within the Cosmos Hub ecosystem. The data is sourced from blockchain transactions, offering insights into the performance of these assets over time.

columns.name: labels
columns.description: The unique identifiers for the assets in the Cosmos Hub ecosystem.

columns.name: symbol
columns.description: The abbreviated symbols for the assets in the Cosmos Hub ecosystem.

columns.name: mean_apr_1d_rolling
columns.description: The mean Average Annual Percentage Return (APR) for the past 1-day rolling period.

columns.name: mean_apr_7d_rolling
columns.description: The mean Average Annual Percentage Return (APR) for the past 7-day rolling period.

columns.name: mean_apr_30d_rolling
columns.description: The mean Average Annual Percentage Return (APR) for the past 30-day rolling period.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_atom_price
tables.description: Cosmos Hub Atom Price Data: This table contains historical prices of the native Cosmos (ATOM) cryptocurrency in USDC, sourced from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem. The data provides insights into the price movements of ATOM over time.

columns.name: time_minutes
columns.description: Timestamp in minutes representing the time at which the price was recorded.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: The native Cosmos cryptocurrency (ATOM).

columns.name: price_in_usdc
columns.description: The price of ATOM in USDC at the given timestamp.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_chain_daily_revenue
tables.description: This table provides a daily breakdown of revenue generated by the Cosmos Hub blockchain and its associated chains. It includes transaction fees, liquidity staking derivatives (LSD) fees, and Inter-Chain Securities (ICS) fees.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date for which the revenue data is reported, in YYYY- MM-DD format.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each blockchain within the Cosmos ecosystem, used to distinguish between different chains.

columns.name: txn_fees
columns.description: Total transaction fees collected from all transactions on the blockchain, in the native cryptocurrency units (e.g., ATOM).

columns.name: lsd_fees
columns.description: Total liquidity staking derivatives fees collected from all LSD-related transactions on the blockchain, in the native cryptocurrency units (e.g., ATOM).

columns.name: ics_fees
columns.description: Total Inter-Chain Securities fees collected from all ICS-related transactions on the blockchain, in the native cryptocurrency units (e.g., ATOM).

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_chain_hourly_revenue
tables.description: This dataset, cosmoshub_chain_hourly_revenue, captures hourly revenue generated from various Cosmos ecosystem blockchains. It provides a comprehensive view of the revenue streams from transaction fees and other sources.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date and time when the revenue was recorded in UTC timezone.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the Cosmos blockchain where the revenue was generated.

columns.name: txn_fees
columns.description: The total transaction fees collected from the blockchain in the specified hour.

columns.name: lsd_fees
columns.description: The total fees collected from Liquid Staking Derivatives (LSD) in the specified hour.

columns.name: ics_fees
columns.description: The total fees collected from Inter-Chain Securities (ICS) in the specified hour.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_ibc_flow
tables.description: This table provides an overview of IBC flows in the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the transmission of assets and data between different blockchain networks. The data is sourced from various Cosmos blockchains, providing a comprehensive view of the network's activity.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of the IBC flow in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

columns.name: stride
columns.description: Stride ID of the IBC flow, uniquely identifying each transfer event

columns.name: persistence
columns.description: Persistence details of the IBC flow, including any relevant metadata

columns.name: cosmoshub
columns.description: Cosmos Hub address associated with the IBC flow, representing the source or destination network

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the IBC flow data was ingested into the database, in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM- DDTHH:MM:SSZ)

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_liquid_staking
tables.description: This table contains data related to liquid staking on the Cosmos Hub blockchain. It provides key metrics for understanding the performance and characteristics of staking on the network.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date when the data was observed or recorded, typically in a standard ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: stride
columns.description: A measure of how well a validator is performing in terms of its effective staking power, taking into account network dynamics.

columns.name: persistence
columns.description: A measure of how well a validator is able to maintain its staking power over time, considering factors like downtime or slashing.

columns.name: cosmoshub
columns.description: The Cosmos Hub blockchain where the staking activity is occurring.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, used for tracking data freshness and provenance.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_liquid_staking_flow
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the inflows and outflows of liquidity in the Cosmos Hub ecosystem. It tracks the total and top inflows and outflows across the network, offering insights into the dynamics of liquid staking.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Time interval in hours, representing the duration over which the inflow and outflow data is calculated.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total amount of liquidity inflow into the Cosmos Hub ecosystem within the specified time interval.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Highest amount of liquidity inflow into the Cosmos Hub ecosystem within the specified time interval.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top inflow transaction within the specified time interval.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total amount of liquidity outflow from the Cosmos Hub ecosystem within the specified time interval.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Highest amount of liquidity outflow from the Cosmos Hub ecosystem within the specified time interval.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top outflow transaction within the specified time interval.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, representing the freshness of the data.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_staking_flow
tables.description: This table tracks the staking flow on the Cosmos Hub, providing insights into the inflow and outflow of assets. It helps users understand the dynamics of the staking ecosystem on the Cosmos Network.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Time in hours when the staking flow data was recorded.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total amount of assets that have flowed into the staking pool within the given time period.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: The largest amount of assets that have flowed into the staking pool within the given time period.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID associated with the top inflow transaction.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total amount of assets that have flowed out of the staking pool within the given time period.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: The largest amount of assets that have flowed out of the staking pool within the given time period.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID associated with the top outflow transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the staking flow data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_bonded_liquidity_flow
tables.description: This table tracks the flow of bonded liquidity in the Osmosis network over time, providing insights into the dynamics of liquidity provision and usage within the ecosystem. The data is sourced from blockchain events across the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Time elapsed in hours since the beginning of the data collection period, serving as a timestamp for the liquidity flow data.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total amount of liquidity inflow into the Osmosis protocol over the specified time period.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Maximum amount of liquidity inflow into the Osmosis protocol over the specified time period.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the transaction that corresponds to the maximum liquidity inflow into the Osmosis protocol.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total amount of liquidity outflow from the Osmosis protocol over the specified time period.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Maximum amount of liquidity outflow from the Osmosis protocol over the specified time period.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the transaction that corresponds to the maximum liquidity outflow from the Osmosis protocol.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, used for tracking data freshness and processing status.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_chain_hourly_revenue
tables.description: This table provides an hourly breakdown of revenue generated by the Osmosis network, offering insights into the blockchain's financial performance and growth. The data is aggregated from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing a comprehensive view of the network's revenue streams.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: The time in hours since the Osmosis network's inception, allowing for chronological analysis of revenue trends.

columns.name: tx_fees
columns.description: Transaction fees collected by the Osmosis network for each hour, representing a significant revenue stream.

columns.name: protorev
columns.description: Protocol revenue generated by Osmosis, including rewards and other incentives for validators and users.

columns.name: swap_fees
columns.description: Fees earned by Osmosis for facilitating swaps between different assets on the network.

columns.name: taker_fees
columns.description: Taker fees collected by Osmosis for providing liquidity and facilitating trades on the network.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, ensuring data freshness and accuracy.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_concentration_of_activity
tables.description: This table tracks the concentration of Osmosis activity across various days, providing insights into the network's overall performance and user engagement within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day in which the Osmosis activity was recorded, representing a period of 24 hours.

columns.name: COA
columns.description: The concentration of Osmosis activity, measuring the level of network engagement and user participation in the Cosmos ecosystem.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_daily_active_users
tables.description: This table provides an overview of daily active users across the Cosmos ecosystem, specifically focusing on Osmosis. It captures key information on user engagement and activity within the ecosystem.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block when the user activity was recorded, representing a point in time on the blockchain.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender or user who interacted with the blockchain, indicating user activity.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the user activity data was ingested into the database, representing the data's availability time.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_daily_active_users_count
tables.description: Daily active users count in the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the growth and adoption of blockchain-based services. This data is sourced from various blockchains within the ecosystem.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Date representing the day for which the daily active user count is reported, in a standard ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: unique_users
columns.description: Total count of unique users actively interacting with the Cosmos ecosystem on a given day.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_ibc_flow
tables.description: This table provides a snapshot of IBC (Inter-Blockchain Communication) flows on the Osmosis network. It captures key metrics such as inflows and outflows between chains in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Time elapsed since the block was committed in hours.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the blockchain network.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total amount of tokens flowing into the Osmosis network.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Largest amount of tokens flowing into the Osmosis network.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top inflow.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total amount of tokens flowing out of the Osmosis network.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Largest amount of tokens flowing out of the Osmosis network.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top outflow.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_liquidity_flow
tables.description: This table provides a detailed overview of liquidity flow in the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the movement of assets across different blockchain networks. It helps users analyze the dynamics of liquidity and identify trends.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Time in hours since the block was mined.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total amount of assets flowing into the network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Largest amount of assets flowing into the network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the transaction that contributed to the top inflow.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total amount of assets flowing out of the network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Largest amount of assets flowing out of the network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the transaction that contributed to the top outflow.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the system.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_new_users_ratio
tables.description: This table provides insights into the growth of new users in the Osmosis blockchain ecosystem, showcasing the ratio of new users to the overall user base. By analyzing these metrics, one can gauge the effectiveness of onboarding processes and network adoption.

columns.name: new_users
columns.description: The total number of new users added to the Osmosis blockchain network.

columns.name: returning_users
columns.description: The total number of users who have previously interacted with the Osmosis blockchain and have returned for another interaction.

columns.name: new_users_ratio
columns.description: The ratio of new users to the total number of users (new and returning) in the Osmosis blockchain network.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The date of the data point, indicating the specific period being measured.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_osmo_price
tables.description: This table provides real-time data on the Osmosis (OSMO) cryptocurrency price in USDC, sourced from the Cosmos ecosystem blockchains. It offers a comprehensive view of the OSMO market performance.

columns.name: time_minutes
columns.description: The time in minutes when the OSMO price was recorded.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: The cryptocurrency asset being priced, in this case, Osmosis (OSMO).

columns.name: price_in_usdc
columns.description: The current price of OSMO in USDC at the time of recording.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, potentially with a higher precision than the time_minutes field.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_osmo_top_stakeholders
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the top stakeholders in the Osmosis network, offering insights into their staked, bonded, and liquid assets. The data is sourced from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing a comprehensive view of the network's key players.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date at which the stakeholder's asset distribution was recorded.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The blockchain address of the stakeholder.

columns.name: staked_amount
columns.description: The total amount of OSMO tokens staked by the address.

columns.name: bonded_amount
columns.description: The amount of OSMO tokens bonded by the address, which is used to secure the network.

columns.name: liquid_amount
columns.description: The amount of OSMO tokens available for use by the address, excluding bonded and staked amounts.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_returning_users_ratio
tables.description: This table tracks the ratio of new users in the Cosmos ecosystem over time, providing insights into the growth and adoption of blockchain services within the network. The data is derived from on-chain activity and offers a unique perspective on user engagement.

columns.name: new_users_ratio
columns.description: The ratio of new users to the total number of users in the Cosmos ecosystem, indicating the rate of new user adoption.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The calendar day on which the new users ratio was recorded, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_staking_flow
tables.description: This table provides a high-level overview of the staking flow for Osmosis, a decentralized exchange and liquidity pool in the Cosmos ecosystem. It tracks the total staking inflow and outflow, as well as the top transactions contributing to these flows.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Timestamp of the data point, represented as a time interval in hours.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total amount of tokens staked into Osmosis validators.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Maximum amount of tokens staked into a single Osmosis validator.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top inflow transaction.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total amount of tokens unstaked from Osmosis validators.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Maximum amount of tokens unstaked from a single Osmosis validator.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top outflow transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested from the blockchain.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_superfluid_staking_flow
tables.description: Superfluid staking flow data for the Osmosis network, providing insights into the hourly staking inflows and outflows.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: The time period in hours at which the staking inflows and outflows were recorded.

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: The total amount of tokens staked into the Osmosis network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: The maximum amount of tokens staked into the Osmosis network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: The transaction ID corresponding to the maximum staking inflow during the specified time period.

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: The total amount of tokens unstaked from the Osmosis network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: The maximum amount of tokens unstaked from the Osmosis network during the specified time period.

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: The transaction ID corresponding to the maximum staking outflow during the specified time period.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_trading_flow
tables.description: This table provides insights into the trading flow of the Osmosis ecosystem, offering a glimpse into the volumes and transactions that have taken place within its pools. By analyzing this data, users can gain a deeper understanding of the market dynamics and trends within the Osmosis network.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: The time in hours since the start of the Osmosis network, allowing for temporal analysis and trend identification.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each pool within the Osmosis network, enabling users to track specific pools and their associated trading activity.

columns.name: volume_in_usd
columns.description: The total volume of transactions in USD for each pool, providing a measure of the overall trading activity within the network.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for each transaction, allowing users to isolate and analyze individual trades within the Osmosis network.

columns.name: max_volume_in_usd
columns.description: The maximum volume of a single transaction in USD, offering insight into the largest trades that have taken place within the Osmosis network.
